page.title: 18Traffic Survey
page.content:
The{A174 }known as the parkway was opened in 1975. It was built to releive the congestion from the { {B1380}Normanby High Street. The Parkway is an important link between I.C.I. Wilton and the {A19. { }In {May 1985 } a series of traffic counts took place on Flatts Lane bridge above the Parkway. Each count took five minutes. Here are the results: 8.25-8.30a.m.{91 vehicles west 167 E. 9.45-9.50a.m.{40 " " 50 " 5.05-5.10p.m.{186 " " 67 "
East is busiest in the morning because many of the vehicles are travelling to I.C.I.Wilton, they return to make west busy later in the day.
